org.divxdede.swing.busy
Interface BusyModel

All Superinterfaces:
BoundedRangeModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBusyModel, FutureBusyModel
public interface BusyModel
extends BoundedRangeModel

DataModel describe a busy state behaviour. A busy state represent a disabled state (inacessible) for a while.

This state is commonly bound to a swing component that can't be used while it is busy. Typically a pretty animation will be show.

When the model is gone to busy, it can be determinate that allow to track the progress and time remaining like a JProgressBar. In fact, a BusyModel is a BoundedRangeModel that allow it to be bounded to a JProgressBar.

BusyModel can be cancellable to allow the controller of this model to cancel the underlying task.

Author:
André Sébastien (divxdede)

cancel

void cancel()
Invoke this method to cancel the current job responsible of the busy state. You need to override this method for implements you own cancellation process. Cancelling a task fire an ActionEvent to all registered ActionListener to this model.
